channel.title: OCCASIONAL CHAIRS – Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE
channel.description: Luxury Home Furniture Designs in UAE

item.title: Renee
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
This whimsical piece has the air of retro chic to it. Textile upholstery in hues that ranges from mustard, aqua and blush to shades of chrome, Renee is rather individualistic and exudes a groovy vintage vibe.

The post Renee appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
FRAME IN PINE WOOD + PLYWOOD.
FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC.
SWIVEL SYSTEM BASE IN 304# STAINLESS STEEL IN BRUSHED GOLD

The post Renee appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: Monterosa chair
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Body Frame In Eucalyptus + Pine Wood + Plywood. 304# Stainless Steel With Shining Champagne Gold Color. Swiveling Chair. Diamond Quilting Design On The Sofa Outer Backrest. Fully Upholstered In Fabric

The post Monterosa chair appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
Body Frame In Eucalyptus + Pine Wood + Plywood.
304# Stainless Steel With Shining Champagne Gold Color.
Swiveling Chair.
Diamond Quilting Design On The Sofa Outer Backrest.
Fully Upholstered In Fabric

The post Monterosa chair appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: TIFANY SWIVEL CHAIR + OTTOMAN
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Defined by its elegant lines and classic silhouette, the timeless Tifany Swivel Chair and Ottoman brings retro glam to any room. Draped in suede-like fabric with a tall wrap-around back and plush seat, it draws you into a comforting embrace.

(Please note that Chair Blue is coming with Ottoman Blue Color)

The post TIFANY SWIVEL CHAIR + OTTOMAN appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
Body Frame in Pine Wood.

Fully Upholstered in Fabric.

Legs in 304# Stainless Steel in Black Matt.

The post TIFANY SWIVEL CHAIR + OTTOMAN appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: GENEVE CHAIR
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Inner Frame In Larch Wood Fully Upholstered In Fabric Feather(goose down)：armrest, backrest Legs: 304# Steel leg in Matt Black .

The post GENEVE CHAIR appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
Inner Frame In Larch Wood
Fully Upholstered In Fabric
Feather(goose down)：armrest, backrest
Legs: 304# Steel leg in Matt Black .

The post GENEVE CHAIR appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: VERA CHAIR
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Vera’s clean-lined and current design is sized for small nooks and focal corners. Gentle arcs and organic curves encased in tactile textile, this piece is beautifully understated.

The post VERA CHAIR appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
FRAME IN PINE WOOD + PLYWOOD.
FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC.
BASE IN 304# STAINLESS STEEL IN BRUSHED GOLD

The post VERA CHAIR appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: SELENA CHAIR
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
The soft barrel design of this organic seamless silhouette is worthy of attention. As delightful as it is luxurious, Selena sets the stage for a compelling and contemporary space.

item.title: SHELLEY CHAIR
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Ever so inviting, Shelley boasts an airy profile and deep seat to languish in over candid conversation. It’s versatile and elegant design complements any style of décor.

item.title: MILLER CHAIR
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
The cocoon-shaped Miller is like being wrapped in the cozy comfort of a giant hug. Perched on a brushed gold girdle base and draped in exquisite fabric that feels as good as it looks - this is what makes a room truly distinctive.

The post MILLER CHAIR appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
FRAME IN SOLID PINE WOOD.
304# STAINLESS STEEL BASE IN BRUSHED GOLD.
FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC
